specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1 to their hit rolls in melee.
specialRules.name: Battle Call

specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1 to their hit rolls in melee.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit shoots pick one of the following shot types: • Rapid: +1A when shooting.
specialRules.name: Eagle-Eyed
specialRules.label: Eagle-Eyed
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit shoots pick one of the following shot types: • Rapid: +1A when shooting.

specialRules.hint: Enemy units get -1 to their rolls when fighting in melee with this unit.
specialRules.name: Malice
specialRules.label: Malice
specialRules.description: Enemy units get -1 to their rolls when fighting in melee with this unit.

specialRules.hint: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1 to melee and shooting when in difficult terrain.

specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1 to melee and shooting when in difficult terrain.

spells.name: Spirit Vines
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Tree Stomp
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Regrowth
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it’s wounded.

spells.name: Insect Attack
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 3 hits with AP(2) each.

spells.name: Harmony
spells.effect: Target piece of terrain within 6” may be moved by up to 6” in any direction or may be removed from play.

spells.name: Harvest
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 3 automatic hits with AP(2).
